title: Tips On League and Editing Videos

embed.description: Bronze Blitz lands a miracle grab, ripperoni. You hear my friends voices, but not mine as I use Windows Game Bar to record my games and it records the sound from the Skype call as well but doesn't record mine. Edited using Adobe Premiere Pro

body: Hi, I was just wondering, how can I improve playing support or hooks cos I can't land as many flash hooks/grabs/binds as I use to and how to improve editing videos. (I edit using Adobe Premiere Pro)
